item.description:
Come once again to the Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight …and get a start (or for some of you, a finish) to your Holiday Shopping at the Winter SOWA Markets.

After a delicious brunch; (the Prix Fixe menu gives you a choice of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea & a sweet ala Julia Child….all for $9.95 (taxes & tips additional)), as well as great conversations, smiles, laughs, etc. some of us will be walking a short distance to the indoor SOWA Winter Market where there will be late season veggies, quality crafts, etc.

Parking is FREE adjacent to the restaurant.

Please pay server directly…Paypal is not accepted at this event

RSVP’s are greatly appreciated!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the bar and retreat to our own tables (& booths)
item.name: Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight
